title: New: Damu – Don't Cry in My Bed
body:
Image sourced from **[TRAFN](http://trafn.tumblr.com/)**

With the Manchester producer’s debut LP, **_‘Unity’_**, now out and available on **_Keysound Records_**, the beat maker has released the LP’s closing track **_‘Don’t cry in my bed_**’ as his new single. Colourful and fragmented, the cut breathes life into a quote, **_“one thing about music, is when it hits you feel no pain”_**, that let’s face it is pretty over used. Yet it manages to seem fresh and fulfilled, the gentle pops of the records percussion inspiring bubbles of a re-emerging passion. Music for a healthy break up.

Stream the track below.
